# Delivery Report Template

**Purpose:** Auto-generated report proving all win conditions were met, providing evidence, and creating professional project close.

> Generated by Project Management Agent when all win conditions = Complete

| **Project Duration** | {{start_date}} - {{end_date}} |
| **Days to Completion** | {{duration_days}} |
| **Project Lead** | {{project_lead}} |

---

## Executive Summary

This report confirms the successful completion of all agreed win conditions for the **{{project_name}}** project. All deliverables have been implemented, tested, and documented as specified in the original Win Condition document dated {{win_condition_date}}.

**Outcome:** All {{total_conditions}} win conditions achieved.

## Handoff Checklist

### Documentation Handoff
- [x] System walkthrough video provided
- [x] SOP documentation delivered
- [x] Troubleshooting guide delivered
- [x] Technical documentation delivered

### Training Handoff
- [x] Live walkthrough session completed
- [x] Q&A period completed
- [x] Recording provided for future reference

### Access Handoff
- [x] Client has admin access to all systems
- [x] Team credentials transferred to client vault
- [x] API keys documented in client's possession
- [x] Our team access will be revoked in 30 days

### Support Transition
- [x] 30-day support window explained
- [x] Support channel established (Slack: #{{client_channel}})
- [x] Escalation process documented
- [x] Future maintenance options discussed

## Usage Instructions

### When to Generate This Report

This report is generated automatically when:
1. All win conditions in Notion are marked "Complete"
2. All evidence links are attached
3. Training sessions are logged

### Manual Generation

To generate manually:
1. Verify all conditions complete
2. Run: `/delivery-report generate --project={{project_id}}`
3. Review draft for accuracy
4. Export to PDF
5. Share with client

### Evidence Requirements

Each condition requires:
- **Screenshot:** PNG/JPG showing completed state
- **Video:** Loom/recording showing functionality
- **Metrics:** If measurable, include data

### After Delivery

1. Schedule 30-day check-in
2. Set reminder for credential revocation (30 days)
3. Update CRM: Project Status = "Completed"
4. Add to portfolio/case studies (with permission)
5. Request testimonial/referral
